name: The Iris Gift
description:
A special artwork made for my special frens in the NFT community, inspired on their amazing power of observation and creation, presented as gift of gratitude and friendship to all those people who have offered me their time, advice, kindness and support. A reminder for us all that we're all gonna make it if we watch each other's back.

Releasing 23 editions on the 23th day of January 2022, it's also my late father's 79th birthday, this artwork is dedicated to him too.
